collectors.title: Database
collectors.titleDetails: (27 total Queries, 27 of them unique across 1 Connection)

queries.sql: SELECT `appointment`.`appointmentDate`, (SELECT SUM(appointmentFee) FROM appointment a WHERE a.appointmentDate = appointment.appointmentDate) as totalRevenue, COUNT(appointment.appointmentID) as totalAppointments FROM `appointment` WHERE `appointment`.`businessID` = '39' AND `appointment`.`appointmentDate` >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY `appointment`.`appointmentDate`

timelineData.name: Query
timelineData.query: SELECT `appointment`.`appointmentDate`, (SELECT SUM(appointmentFee) FROM appointment a WHERE a.appointmentDate = appointment.appointmentDate) as totalRevenue, COUNT(appointment.appointmentID) as totalAppointments FROM `appointment` WHERE `appointment`.`businessID` = '39' AND `appointment`.`appointmentDate` >= DATE_SUB(CURDATE(), INTERVAL 7 DAY) GROUP BY `appointment`.`appointmentDate`
